p:
Mean richness of the seed bank was similar in RS (3 ± 0.6) and RA (2.3 ± 0.4) ( X
2 = 3.3, Df = 1, P = 0.07). At RS the mean richness of exotic (2 ± 0.4) and native (1 ± 0.3) species was similar to the mean of exotic (1.6 ± 0.3) and native (0.6 ± 0.2) species at RA ( X
2 = 1.3 Df = 1, P > 0.05; X
2 = 2.5 Df = 1, P > 0.05, respectively).
